questions.quote: Yeah, you know we need a fourth for the back nine. You want in?
Well I'm sorry if I ruined your life. That's exactly what I set out to do.
Jerry, it's getting late. You've cleaned up the car. You've made all your phone calls. Why are you still here?
They're all the same. You go, you sit, you eat popcorn, you watch. I'm sick of it.
Kramer, I am so sick of you comin' in here and eatin' all my food. Now shut that door and get the hell out of here!
You wanna hang out here, at phase two of the Pines of Mar Gables?
Well, Mr. Kramer, looks like you're in the hole $3200... Will that be cash or check?
Oh. Let me ask you, when someone is lying, is it true that their pants are actually on fire?
Well, what is that? That's a crime! Do you know how hot those things get? They should be wearing cotton.
Because I don't like to carry my wallet. My Osteopath says that it's bad for my spine. It throws my hips off kilter.
